query:
SELECT 
  'vendas' as tabela, 
  COUNT(*) as total_excluidos,
  SUM(valorTotal) as valor_total_excluido
FROM vendas 
WHERE excluido = 1 AND YEAR(dataVenda) = 2026
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'despesas_v2' as tabela, 
  COUNT(*) as total_excluidos,
  SUM(valorTotal) as valor_total_excluido
FROM despesas_v2 
WHERE excluido = 1 AND YEAR(createdAt) = 2026
